Question: Shenzhen Kinstone D&T Develop Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Kinstone D&T Develop Co., Ltd

Product: Intelligent business display, tablets, notebooks, security products, android intelligent robot

- Offers intelligent all-in-one products for health and sports equipment, magic mirror, and various forms of indoor and outdoor foreign display advertising machines
- Provides education, government, and consumer tablets and laptops
- Features face recognition and temperature measuring machines, as well as face recognition entrance guard gates for security
- Offers an android intelligent robot
- Strong focus on technological innovation and user experience, with a professional after-sales service team
- Constantly develops more advanced, efficient, and stable intelligent display products and solutions
- Continuously strengthens technological innovation and market expansion to provide high-quality intelligent display terminal solutions
Summary_cn:
深圳金石D＆T开发有限公司
产品：智能商业显示器、平板电脑、笔记本电脑、安防产品、安卓智能机器人

- 提供健康和运动设备、魔镜以及各种形式的室内外外文广告投放机的智能一体化产品
- 提供教育、政府和消费者平板电脑和笔记本电脑
- 提供人脸识别和体温测量设备，以及人脸识别门禁门禁系统来保证安全
- 提供安卓智能机器人
- 强调技术创新和用户体验，并拥有专业的售后服务团队
- 不断开发更先进、高效、稳定的智能显示产品和解决方案
- 持续加强技术创新和市场拓展，提供高质量的智能显示终端解决方案
